intro: Indian Institute of Technology Indore (IIT Indore), one of the premier institutions in India, was established in 2009. Part of the prestigious IIT system, IIT Indore is renowned for its excellence in education, research, and innovation. Located in the city of Indore, Madhya Pradesh, the institute has rapidly grown to become a significant center for engineering, science, and humanities education and research.
academics: IIT Indore offers a range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and doctoral programs across various disciplines. The academic structure is designed to foster interdisciplinary learning and research. The key programs include:

academics.title: Undergraduate Programs
academics.info: Bachelor of Technology (B.Tech) in several engineering disciplines such as Computer Science, Electrical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Metallurgy Engineering.

academics.title: Postgraduate Programs
academics.info: Master of Technology (M.Tech), Master of Science (M.Sc), and Master of Science in Research (MS-Research) in diverse specializations.

academics.title: Doctoral Programs
academics.info: Programs in engineering, science, and humanities

academics: The curriculum at IIT Indore emphasizes both theoretical knowledge and practical application, encouraging students to engage in research projects and internships.
